credentials: PHD 1986 VA Polytechnic Inst & State U
name: MAJID SARMADI

ratings.comment: This class is 2.5 hours long once a week which was very boring. Tbh I didn't pay attention much in class but did well on tests if you understand study guides. He is nice and funny but just boring. Heather the TA is very helpful. Only take if you have to thought. Only graded on a 10-page research paper and quick presentation of it and 2 exams.
jesus christ this class was boring. Majid was funny but dont take this class if you dont have to. the most boring 2 and a half hours of my life
Very long lectures but he tries to make them interesting. He is very proud of his achievements and talks about them a lot. Overall I learned a lot of his class but it was not super enjoyable.
Lots of work but the material and his teaching style made everything worth it.  Every lecture was another "Aha!" moment that deepened my understanding of physics, colors, and design.

As others have stated, the lectures are simply read word for word. You're better off reading the book and using Google to help study for exams. Don't bother taking notes because you won't have time to write it all down - and most of the time what is said in lecture will contradict what the book says. Buy the book, don't bother with the swatch kit.

As an Interior Design major I felt this class was useless to my major. Only the content on the first exam applies to interior design everything else is for Textile and Apparel design. His jokes aren't that funny and by the end of the semester you're usually fed up with his class.  Think you studied well for the exams...think again!
Difficult to understand.  He reads the his power point in lecture.  Tests are easy though if you study from the book.

Impossible class. Know your chemistry. Very few people get A's. Majid could do a better job of explaining the material and taking time for everyone to understand but he wants to move through it all quite fast. There really should be a discussion section or a lab for this class to help. He tries but unless you work really really hard all year, no A

He is a great professor! He really knows his material and you can tell he likes what he does. He isn't very easy, but if you know your material you will do fine. He's funny and cracks jokes in lecture!  If you ever need help just go in during his office hours and he will really do all he can to help you! You can tell he truly cares about his studen

He is a little wierd but he is really a good teacher.  I learned a lot from him and found him to be very smart.He does teach classes that are hard but he tries to make jokes to make it better.  He really knows his stuff, and is really interested in his career field.I really liked him and would recommend him, but tell people to wait and he gets bett

Smart guy and makes some things interesting that are usually quite dull, but overall not the best class.  Probably more because of the boring material than him.  Oh and the tests are more or less impossible, especially the first, so don't be afraid when you think you bombed it.
